overview.en: CCY (Chong Cao Yuan) proposes and implements the solution of blockchain technology + new concept commodity traceability for the problems of traditional commodity industry. Solve the problem of product quality fidelity, accountability, lack of trust; strengthen the value of the entire industry and the liquidity of industry assets; through the application of CCY and community promotion, popularize and accelerate the spread of commodity-related industry applications, forming a new type And unique commodity culture and ecology.
overview.zh: CCY（长城链）针对于传统大宗商品行业的问题，提出并实现了区块链技术+新概念大宗商品溯源的解决方案。解决产品品质保真、追责、信任缺失的问题；加强整个产业的价值提升和行业资产的流动性；通过CCY的应用以及社区推广，进而普及和加速大宗商品相关产业应用的传播，形成一个新型而独特的大宗商品文化生态。
